de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg

Class SVGScoreBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg.SVGScoreBar

  • public class SVGScoreBar
extends Object
    Draw a score bar. Essentially like a progress bar, left-to-right, displaying a relative score.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double fill
      Fill value
      private NumberFormat format
      Number format, set to print the actual score

      Label (on the right)
      protected double size
      Total size
